name: Hellfire Engine
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren\'t silvered
condition_immunities: charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, unconscious

traits.Immutable Form: The hellfire engine is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.
traits.Magic Resistance: The hellfire engine has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Flesh-Crushing Stride: The hellfire engine moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the hellfire engine enters must make a DC 18+1d10 + 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed to the nearest space out of the hellfire engine's path. On a failed save, the creature falls prone and takes 28 (8d6) bludgeoning damage.
